Html:
As part of learning Irony this week, I've been working through Daniel Flower's fantastic Irony Freight Language article.

The code was written way back in 2008 and doesn't work with the latest Irony, so I had to update it (with some help from rivantsov!). In case it's usefule to anyone else on their Irony journey, I've out the updated code up on GitHub here:

https://github.com/seankearon/irony-freight-language

Any comments, corrections or contributions welcome!
